a) Pre-registration of basic education learners in public schools and targeted number of enrollees;
b) Flexible learning options to be implemented in case of extreme heat and other climate-related conditions; and
c) Updated data on the procurement and delivery of textbooks and other learning materials, on teaching and non-teaching personnel in public schools, on classroom shortages and those under repair, and on its computerization program
